metadata.title: CVE-2018-4188 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 11.4 isaffected. Safari before 11.1.1 is affected. iCloud before 7.5 on Windows isaffected. iTunes before 12.7.5 on Windows is affected. tvOS before 11.4 isaffected. The issue involves the "WebKit" component. It allows remoteattackers to spoof the address bar via a crafted web site.

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
